no-tours: No tours available for the selected category and types. Simplify you filter on click "All Categories" and "All Types".
no-post-description: There is no description to this post
have-questions: Have questions or want to connect? Use the contact form below or reach out via email, phone, or social media!
message-sent-successfully: Your message has been sent successfully!
message-send-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
tours-description: Discover the wonders of Egypt with Mystical Egypt Travels. Unique tours and excursions for an unforgettable journey.
about-me-description: Meet your professional Egypt guide! I live here and know all the secrets to make your trip unforgettable. Book excursions that will give you the impressions of a lifetime and allow you to truly discover Egypt.
contacts-description: Contact me to plan your perfect Egypt trip! I am always available to answer any questions you may have to make your adventure unforgettable.
travelers-assistant-description: Discover handy tools and tips to plan the perfect trip!

list_to_do: Passport (valid for at least 6 months from the date of entry).
Visa (if required, obtain it in advance or upon arrival).
Insurance (medical and accident coverage).
Tickets (round-trip tickets, electronic or printed).
Hotel booking confirmation.
Copies of all documents (passport, visa, insurance) in case of loss.
Bank card (ensure it can be used abroad).
Cash (USD, EUR, or Egyptian pounds).
Reserve funds for unforeseen expenses.
International roaming or a local SIM card.
Install messengers and communication apps (e.g., WhatsApp).
Download offline maps (Google Maps, MAPS.ME).
Light clothing for a hot climate.
Swimwear, beach shoes.
Hat or cap for sun protection.
Comfortable footwear for excursions.
Scarf or shawl for visiting temples and mosques.
Personal medications (with enough for the entire trip).
Sunscreen and after-sun care.
Insect repellent.
Antiseptics and masks (for personal hygiene).
Chargers for phones, tablets, and cameras.
Power bank.
Plug adapter (if needed).
Excursion schedule or a list of places to visit.
Download movies, books, or music for the flight.
Check the weather forecast for the trip days.
Information on local rules and regulations.
Contacts of the consulate and emergency services.
Avoid tap water, use bottled water only.
Airline weight and size restrictions for baggage.
All sharp objects and liquids placed in checked luggage.
Carry-on complies with regulations (including liquids ≤100 ml).
Check that all documents are present.
Ensure transportation to the airport is arranged.
Arrive at the airport 2–3 hours before departure.
